Replace.Text: 建造者可以建造摩艾石像改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]摩艾石像提供+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。每2个相邻的摩艾石像+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。在火山土单元格之上或与其相邻时，+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。与海岸或湖泊单元格相邻时，+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。随着市政与科技树的发展，可获得额外的 [ICON_Culture] 文化值与 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。可建在平原、平原丘陵、草原、草原丘陵或火山土之上。只能建在相邻湖泊或近海的单元格上。

Your Builders can now make Moai improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Moai provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every 2 adjacent Moai. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture if on or adjacent to a Volcanic Soil tile. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to a Coast or Lake tile . Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Civics and Technology Tree. Can be built on Plains, Plains Hills, Grassland, Grassland Hills, or Volcanic Soil. Can only be placed adjacent to a Lake or Coast tile.
从所有 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物中获得的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+100%。
您通往任何城邦的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线都为起源城市的每个独立区域+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to any city-state provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every specialty district in the origin city.
此城中每有1位您所创建（或主流）宗教的信徒，国际与国内 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供的 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值便+0.5。
International and domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes receive +0.5 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every follower in this city, of your founded or majority religion.
当您激活一位 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人时，其会将您所创立宗教（或您主流宗教）的400点宗教压力传播到6单元格内的城市。
When you activate a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person they spread 400 Religious pressure of your founded (or majority) religion to cities within 6 tiles.
除市中心以外，所有位于河流旁的区域提供2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
All districts at the riverside except city center provide 2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
剧院广场区域的相邻加成提升50%，与其他玩家同盟后，每一级同盟都额外提升50%的剧院广场相邻加成。
Increase 50% of theater district adjacent bonus，and each ally level with other player provide extra 50% increase of theater district adjacent bonus.
您的建造者现在可以建造改良设施巴特依。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。每与1座加成资源和娱乐设施相邻，则+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值（拥有“人文主义”市政后+2 [Icon_Culture] 文化值）。研究完“飞行”后将产出 [Icon_Tourism] 旅游业绩。无法建造在另一座巴特依旁。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Batey.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every adjacent Bonus Resource and Entertainment Complex (increased to +2 [Icon_Culture] Culture when Humanism is discovered). Provides [Icon_Tourism] Tourism after researching Flight. Cannot be built adjacent to another Batey or on Hills.
